issue.title: Add gandiva as a module to modules in java root pom
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6280](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6280). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add gandiva to modules at: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/java/pom.xml#L649.


It will help Intellij IDE solve class dependency for java/gandiva
